'''Amrita Mayflies''' are an [[Exploration]] mechanic found in [[Vourukasha Oasis]], [[Sumeru]].

They are only available at night (18:00 &ndash; 6:00) and will disappear during the day. The mayflies must be attacked by the player to cause the to enter a submissive state. [[Sorush (Gadget)|Sorush]] can then be used to fly into them to collect them. If Sorush then flies into activated [[Sunyata Flower|Sunyata Flowers]] with a collected mayfly, the flowers will become energized. Energizing all the flowers in a set will give a treasure chest.
